main event: An unidentified aerial object was sighted on August 2, 1963, near Camp Springs, Maryland and Fort Belvoir, Virginia.
interesting points: The object was reported to be round and white, resembling a star in the southern sky., The object had variable and erratic speed and intense visibility., The sighting lasted for over 10 minutes., The object moved from west to east across the sky., There is a possibility that the sighting was confused with a balloon.
sighted object: round white object in the sky
